channel.title: CVE Feed for decentraland -- single-sign-on-client
channel.description: The latest CVEs for decentraland -- single-sign-on-client

item.title: CVE-2023-41049|2023-09-01T19:35:09.224Z -- decentraland -- single-sign-on-client
item.description: @dcl/single-sign-on-client is an open source npm library which deals with single sign on authentication flows. Improper input validation in the `init` function allows arbitrary javascript to be executed using the `javascript:` prefix. This vulnerability has been patched on version `0.1.0`. Users are advised to upgrade. Users unable to upgrade should limit untrusted user input to the `init` function.
